author: Christopher Carbone
title: New trial to test if anti-inflammatory drug colchicine prevents COVID-19 complications
description: A new international trial will examine whether a common anti-inflammatory drug known as colchicine could ward off COVID-19 symptoms and potentially prevent the need for hospitalization for some patients.
content:
